byline.contributor: Saeed Al-Batati reported from Al Mukalla, Yemen, and Rick Gladstone from New York. David D. Kirkpatrick and Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from Cairo, and Mohammad Ali Kalfood from Sana, Yemen.
byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and RICK GLADSTONE

abstract: At least 31 civilians are reported killed and dozens injured in Saudi-led airstrike on Yemen's Al-Mazraq camp for displaced families.
lead_paragraph: Saudi-led military actions intensified in Yemen, including a strike on a missile depot in Sana, which set a fire that sent civilians in a nearby village fleeing.

headline.main: Dozens Are Reported Killed as Saudi-Led Strike Hits Camp for Displaced Yemeni Civilians
headline.print_headline: Dozens Are Reported Killed as Saudi-Led Strike Hits Camp for Displaced Yemeni Civilians

snippet: Saudi-led military actions intensified in Yemen, including a strike on a missile depot in Sana, which set a fire that sent civilians in a nearby village fleeing.
